/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings, painted in hues of red and white, stand tall and proud, their facades adorned with balconies and windows. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of the sky, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of this urban landscape.
